info.description: Expense Report Service (ERS) is the next-generation v4 API for operations related to creating and processing Expense Reports. In order to interact with this API, a client must include either an authorized User or Company JWT in the header of each request, or use an X.509 client certificate which has been white-listed by the ERS team.
info.title: Expense Report Service

patch.summary: Advances the specified report to the next step if it is in a system step

parameters.name: concur-correlationid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the consumer making the API calls. Minimum length: 6 characters

parameters.name: accept-language
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user's locale that indicates the language in which the API response should be formulated

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the report

parameters.name: systemApproveReportRequest
parameters.description: systemApproveReportRequest

400.description:
Specified context not supported

error.submit.Generic: An error occurred while submitting the selected report. The report was not submitted

error.submit.no_entries: The expense report has no expenses. You must create at least one expense in order to submit the report

error.workflow.no_clearingcode: Either the credit card account or the payment type is missing a clearing account code. Contact your Expense administrator

error.workflow.invalid_action: The action cannot be executed because it is not valid for the report workflow

error.workflow.incomplete_receipt_review: You have not finished reviewing all the receipts in this report.  Your company requires that you review receipts during approval

error.submit.rptXctMaxThreshold: This expense report cannot be submitted until all blocking exceptions are resolved

error.submit.entryXctMaxThreshold: This expense report cannot be submitted until all blocking exceptions are resolved

error.submit.undefined_expense_type: The expense report contains one or more expenses with an expense type of Undefined. You must select an expense type for each expense before you can submit the report

error.submit.missing_reqd_fields: At least one required field in this report is empty. Please provide a value and then submit the report

error.submit.missing_alloc_reqd_fields: At least one required allocation field in this report is empty. Please provide the appropriate value, and then submit the report

error.submit.missingKids: This report contains a Lodging expense that is not itemized. Lodging expenses must be itemized in the report before it can be submitted

error.submit.itemDiff: The expense report contains at least one itemized expense. The itemization amounts do not add up to the expense amount. Edit the itemized entries to make the required changes before submitting the report

error.submit.itemMissing: This report cannot be submitted because one or more entries must be itemized. Itemize the entries and then submit the report

error.submit.alreadySubmitted: The report has already been submitted and cannot be submitted again

error.submit.cannotSubmitAsDelegate: The report cannot be submitted by the Delegate

error.submit.cashadvance_cant_carry_balance: Cash Advances must be entirely utilized or returned. Please enter a Cash Advance Return on this report to return the remaining balance

error.submit.cashadvance_negative_balance: The Cash Advance Balance is negative because a Cash Advance Return is greater than the remaining balance. Either enter a Currency Gain/Loss expense to bring the balance to zero or adjust the Cash Advance Return amount to bring the balance to zero. Then, click Submit again

error.submit.single_row_itinerary: This report contains at least one itinerary with a single itinerary row. An itinerary is not valid until it has at least two rows. Please add another row to complete the itinerary

error.submit.invalidAttendeeType: This report contains at least one entry with an attendee of an invalid type.  Please remove the attendee(s) before submitting the report

info.submit.notify_by_delegate: A notification has been sent to the employee

cannot_approve_your_own_report: This expense report was created by you. You cannot approve your own report

no_approver: You must identify an approver before the expense report moves on to the next workflow step

invalid_auth_approver: This report cannot be sent to the next approver. This workflow step must be approved by a specialized approver called an Authorized Approver. The selected approver is not an Authorized Approver. Select another approver

no_approver.not_editable_step: There are no approvers defined in your workflow. Please contact your Expense administrator

no_approver.change_my_info: Missing the required approver for next workflow step. You may be able to select an approver; otherwise contact your Expense administrator for assistance

wf_config_invalid_next_step: You must identify an approver before the expense report moves on to the next workflow step

not_an_approver: This report cannot be sent to the next approver because the selected approver is no longer authorized to approve reports. Please select another approver

approver_cum_reportowner: You cannot send this report to this approver since this person created this report

approver_cum_reportowner.is_editableby: Your workflow is configured such that the report would come back to the report owner during some step. Please contact your Employee Administrator to change the approvers

instance_out_of_date: The approval workflow that this expense report uses has changed. Please select a new approver in order to approve and process this expense report

review_approval_flow_approver: Review Approvers in the workflow

cost_object_step: The next approval step is a Cost object step and cannot be approved through Mobile

step_exit_blocking_by_exception: One or more blocking exceptions are preventing approval submission. Resolve the exception before proceeding

receiptimagehold.workflow.noapprover: Missing the required approver for next step. Cannot advance report out of imaging hold. Contact your Expense administrator for assistance

error.workflow.invalid_report_key: The expense report no longer exists in the system

attendee_total_error: This report contains at least one entry with invalid attendee amounts.  Please correct the attendee amounts before approving

approver_cashadvance_owner.is_editableby: Your workflow is configured such that the cash advance would come back to the cash advance owner during some step. Please contact your Employee Administrator to change the approvers

error.workflow.missing_alloc_reqd_fields: At least one required allocation field in this report lacks data. Please provide the appropriate value, and then approve the report

error.recall.cannotRecall: Expense report cannot be recalled

error.workflow.noComments: Cannot send report back without providing comments. Add a comment to explain why you are returning the report

statusId.invalidValue: Invalid 'statusId' value specified

500.description: Internal server error. Retry your request again

403.description: Caller cannot modify System workflow step

patch.summary: Sends back the specified report to report owner

parameters.name: concur-correlationid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the consumer making the API calls. Minimum length: 6 characters

parameters.name: accept-language
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user's locale that indicates the language in which the API response should be formulated

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the report

parameters.name: systemSendBackReportRequest
parameters.description: systemSendBackReportRequest

400.description:
Specified context not supported

Invalid reportId

error.workflow.noComments: Cannot send report back without providing comments. Add a comment to explain why you are returning the report

no_approver: You must identify an approver before the expense report moves on to the next workflow step

invalid_auth_approver: This report cannot be sent to the next approver. This workflow step must be approved by a specialized approver called an Authorized Approver. The selected approver is not an Authorized Approver. Select another approver

no_approver.not_editable_step: There are no approvers defined in your workflow. Please contact your Expense administrator

wf_config_invalid_next_step: You must identify an approver before the expense report moves on to the next workflow step

not_an_approver: This report cannot be sent to the next approver because the selected approver is no longer authorized to approve reports. Please select another approver

error.workflow.invalid_report_key: The expense report no longer exists in the system

error.workflow.missing_alloc_reqd_fields: At least one required allocation field in this report lacks data. Please provide the appropriate value, and then approve the report

500.description: Internal server error. Retry your request again

403.description: Caller cannot modify System workflow step

get.summary: Gets report details for the specified report.
get.description: Returns report details for the specified report. Also returns a self link, plus each of the following links, contingent on the existence of the resource: comments, exceptions, expenses, formFields.

parameters.name: concur-correlationid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the consumer making the API calls. Minimum length: 6 characters

parameters.name: accept-language
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user's locale that indicates the language in which the API response should be formulated

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the report

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Concur user

parameters.name: contextType
parameters.description: The access level of the Concur user, which determines the form fields they can view/modify

500.description: Internal server error. Retry your request again

403.description:
Specified context type is invalid for this API. Review the documentation for supported context type,
User is not allowed to access this report

parameters.name: concur-correlationid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the consumer making the API calls. Minimum length: 6 characters

parameters.name: accept-language

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the report

parameters.name: report
parameters.description: Report body

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Concur user

parameters.name: contextType
parameters.description: The access level of the Concur user, which determines the form fields they can view/modify

400.description:
Specified context not supported,
Invalid field value specified,
User does not have proper role

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the consumer making the API calls. Minimum length: 6 characters

parameters.name: accept-language
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user's locale that indicates the language in which the API response should be formulated

endDate.description: The hotel checkout date (ISO-8601) (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601). Format: YYYY-MM-DD .

locationId.description: The unique identifier of the location for this hotel

startDate.description: The hotel checkin date (ISO-8601) (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601). Format: YYYY-MM-DD .

vendorName.description: The name of the hotel vendor. Maximum length: 255 characters. Examples: 'Hilton', 'Four Points by Sheraton, Seattle'

allocationSetId.description: The identifier of the Allocation set associated with the expense. Allocations which belong to the same set were created at the same time.

allocationState.description: Allocation state for the expense. Possible values: 'FULLY_ALLOCATED', 'NOT_ALLOCATED', 'PARTIALLY_ALLOCATED'

approvedAmount.description: The approved amount of the expense, in the report currency

approverAdjustedAmount.description: The total amount adjusted for the expense by the approver

attendeeCount.description: The total number of attendees associated with the expense

businessPurpose.description: The text input for the business purpose by the user

claimedAmount.description: The total non-personal amount claimed for reimbursement for the expense

ereceiptImageId.description: The unique identifier of the eReceipt image associated with the expense

exchangeRate.description: Exchange rate data for the expense. Please refer to the 'ExchangeRate' object for more information

expenseId.description: The unique identifier for the expense

expenseSourceIdentifiers.description: The list of expense sources associated with the expense

expenseType.description: The expense type information for the expense. Please refer to the 'ExpenseType' object for more information

hasBlockingExceptions.description: Whether the expense has any exceptions that blocks it from being submitted

hasExceptions.description: Whether the expense has any exceptions

hasMissingReceiptDeclaration.description: Whether the expense has an affidavit declaration for missing receipt

imageCertificationStatus.description: The final status of the receipt image associated with the expense. Possible values: Refer [Receipts Status V4 API](https://github.concur.com/receipts/receipt-service/wiki/GRDC-API-Docs#possible-digitizationstatus-codes)

isAutoCreated.description: Whether the expense is auto created

isImageRequired.description: Whether the image is required for the expense

isPaperReceiptRequired.description: Whether the paper receipt is required for the expense to be submitted

isPersonalExpense.description: Whether the expense is marked as personal (that is, non-reimbursable) by the user

jptRouteId.description: The unique route ID to identify a Japan rail route

links.description: Resource links related to this call

location.description: The location information of the expense. Please refer to the 'Location' object for more information

paymentType.description: The payment type information for the expense. Please refer to the 'PaymentType' object for more information

postedAmount.description: The amount of the expense, in the report currency

receiptImageId.description: The unique identifier of the image associated with the expense

ticketNumber.description: The ticket number associated with the travel

transactionAmount.description: The amount of the expense, in the transaction currency paid to the vendor

transactionDate.description: The transaction date (ISO-8601) of the expense (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601). Format: YYYY-MM-DD

travelAllowance.description: The travel allowance data associated with the expense. Please refer to the 'TravelAllowance' object for more information

vendor.description: The vendor information for the expense. Please refer to the 'Vendor' object for more information

creditCardTransactionId.description: The unique identifier of the credit card transaction (indexed transactionId) associated with the expense

ereceipt.description: EReceipt information for the expense. Please refer to the 'EReceipt' object for more information

expenseAttendees.description: The attendee details associated with the smart expense. Please refer to the 'ExpenseAttendees' object for more information

isAutoCreated.description: Whether this expense is auto created. This element only applies to POST expense request. Default value: false

personalCardTransactionId.description: The unique identifier of the personal card transaction associated with the expense

quickExpenseId.description: The unique identifier of the mobile expense associated with the expense. When 'quickExpenseId' is specified, 'exchangeRate.value' field value will be ignored and it's value will be read from exchange rate currency service but 'exchangeRate.operation' will still be honored

trip.description: Trip data associated with the expense. Please refer to the 'Trip' object for more information

id.description: The id of the validation error

message.description: The detailed message of the validation error

source.description: The type of validation which failed

customData.description: This is a set of data that the custom fields contain for the resource based on the configuration. This set might be empty if no custom fields are configured

reclaimCode.description: The tax reclaim code. Maximum length: 20 characters

taxAuthorityId.description: The unique identifier of the tax authority

taxAuthorityName.description: The name of the tax authority

taxCode.description: The tax code. Maximum length: 20 characters

taxFormId.description: The unique identifier of the tax form associated with the expense

taxLabel.description: The localized label of the tax authority

taxRateTypeId.description: The unique identifier of the tax rate type id

taxRateTypeName.description: The name of the tax rate type

taxReclaimConfigurationId.description: The unique identifier of the tax reclaim configuration id

hasCaravanAttached.description: Whether the mileage expense has caravan attached to the car. Default value: false

hasDogIncluded.description: Whether the mileage expense includes a dog for work purposes. Default value: false

hasForestOrConstructionSiteRoadInRoute.description: Whether the mileage route is via a forest road or construction site road. Default value: false

hasForestRoadInRoute.description: Whether the mileage route has forest road. Default value: false

hasMachinery.description: Whether machines or equipment are transported in the car for this mileage expenses. Default value: false

hasMobileCanteenOrHeavyLoadAttached.description: Whether the mileage expense has mobile canteen or is transporting a heavy load attached to the car. Default value: false

hasTrailerAttached.description: Whether the mileage expense has trailer attached to the car. Default value: false

isMarkedAsHigherRate.description: Whether a higher rate should be applied to the mileage expense. Default value: false

odometerEnd.description: The odometer reading at the end of the journey

odometerStart.description: The odometer reading at the start of the journey

passengerCount.description: The number of passengers in the vehicle during the journey

personalDistance.description: The portion of the journey attributed to personal use. Default value: 0

routeId.description: The unique identifier of the route for this journey

totalDistance.description: The total distance for this journey

vehicleId.description: The unique identifier for the vehicle used for this journey

code.description: The code of the expense type

id.description: The unique identifier of the expense type. Maximum length: 5 characters. Example: 'BRKFT'

isDeleted.description: Whether the expense type returned is deleted or not.

name.description: The name of the expense type (localized as per accept-language header)

href.description: The URL of the related HATEOAS link that you can use for subsequent calls

method.description: The HTTP method required for the related call

rel.description: The link relationship that describes how the href relates to the API call

businessPurpose.description: The text input for the business purpose by the user

comment.description: The expense report comment added by the user

country.description: The country name associated with the report (localized as per accept-language header)

countrySubDivisionCode.description: The location country sub division ISO 3166-2 code (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2)

customData.description: This is a set of data that the custom fields contain for the resource based on the configuration. This set might be empty if no custom fields are configured

endDate.description: The end date (ISO-8601) of the report as used for trip-based reporting (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601). Format: YYYY-MM-DD

isCopyDownInherited.description: If this flag is set to true, any change in the report header fields will be copied down to expenses, itemizations and allocations, as per the configuration. Usage of this flag should be deliberate as data corruption could result.

isPaperReceiptsReceived.description: Whether paper receipts have been received for the report

name.description: The expense report name input by the user

policy.description: The policy name to which the report adheres to

policyId.description: The unique identifier of the policy that applies to this report

reportDate.description: The date (ISO-8601) assigned to the report by the user (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601).  Format: YYYY-MM-DD

reportSource.description: The source of the report. Possible values: EA - Expense Assistant, MOB - Mobile, OTHER - Unknown, SE - Smart Expense, TR - Travel Request, UI - Web UI

startDate.description: The start date (ISO-8601) of the report as used for trip-based reporting (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601). Format: YYYY-MM-DD

creditCardTransactionId.description: The unique identifier of the credit card transaction (indexed transactionId) associated with the expense

expenseCaptureImageId.description: The unique identifier of the expense capture image associated with the expense

jptRouteId.description: The unique identifier to identify a Japan rail route

personalCardTransactionId.description: The unique identifier of the personal card transaction associated with the expense

quickExpenseId.description: The unique identifier of the mobile expense associated with the expense

segmentId.description: The unique identifier of the segment associated with the expense

segmentTypeId.description: Segment type id associated with the trip. Possible values: AIRFR - Air Ticket, AIRSU - Air Subscription, CARRT - Car Rental, DININ - Dining, EVENT - Event, HOTEL - Hotel Reservation, INSUR - Insurance, LIMOF - Limousine Reservation, MISC - Miscellaneous, PARKG - Parking Fee, RAILF - Train Ticket, RAISU - Train Subscription, TAXIF - Taxi Fare, VISA - Visa

tripId.description: The unique identifier of the trip id associated with the expense

id.description: The unique identifier of the custom field e.g. 'custom1', 'orgUnit1'

isValid.description: Whether the value returned is valid or not. This value is returned for custom fields of all data types and is specifically evaluated for list items to represent the current status. Default value: true

value.description: The value of the custom field. This field can have values for all the supported data types such as 'text', 'integer', 'boolean' and 'listItemId'. Maximum length: 48 characters

carEReceipt.description: The eReceipt car data. Please refer to the 'CarEReceipt' object for more information

hotelEReceipt.description: The eReceipt hotel data. Please refer to the 'HotelEReceipt' object for more information

id.description: The unique identifier of the eReceipt with the expense

imageId.description: The unique identifier of the eReceipt image associated with the expense

templateURL.description: The URL of the eReceipt template. Maximum length: 512 characters

type.description: The type of eReceipt associated with the expense. Possible values: 'AIR', 'CAR', 'GASXX', 'GENERAL', 'GRTRN', 'HOTEL', 'JPT', 'MEALS', 'OFFIC', 'PRKNG', 'RAIL', 'RIDE', 'SHIPG', 'TELEC'

airTrip.description: Air trip data associated with the expense. Please refer to the 'AirTrip' object for more information

bookingOrigin.description: Booking origin of the trip. Possible values: AETM - Amadeus E-Travel, CLIQ - Concur Travel, PANM - Open Booking, TRPT - TripIt, TSUP - Travel Supplier

bookingSource.description: Booking source of the trip. Maximum length: 48 characters. Examples: 'Expedia', 'Travelocity', 'Manual'

carTrip.description: Car trip data associated with the expense. Please refer to the 'CarTrip' object for more information

cliqbookPaymentId.description: Cliqbook payment id associated with the trip

cliqbookPaymentMethod.description: Cliqbook payment method associated with the trip. Possible values: 'GHOST_CARD' or 'FLGHT_PASS'

hotelTrip.description: Hotel trip data associated with the expense. Please refer to the 'HotelTrip' object for more information

merchantCode.description: Merchant code associated with the trip. Maximum length: 4 characters

rideTrip.description: Ride or Taxi trip data associated with the expense. Please refer to the 'RideTrip' object for more information

segmentId.description: The unique identifier of the segment associated with the expense

segmentTypeId.description: Segment type id associated with the trip. Possible values: AIRFR - Air Ticket, AIRSU - Air Subscription, CARRT - Car Rental, DININ - Dining, EVENT - Event, HOTEL - Hotel Reservation, INSUR - Insurance, LIMOF - Limousine Reservation, MISC - Miscellaneous, PARKG - Parking Fee, RAILF - Train Ticket, RAISU - Train Subscription, TAXIF - Taxi Fare, VISA - Visa

startLocationId.description: The unique identifier of the start location associated with the trip

tripId.description: The unique identifier of the trip id associated with the expense

allocationSetId.description: The identifier of the Allocation set associated with the expense. Allocations which belong to the same set were created at the same time.

allocationState.description: Allocation state for the expense. Possible values: 'FULLY_ALLOCATED', 'NOT_ALLOCATED', 'PARTIALLY_ALLOCATED'

approvedAmount.description: The approved amount of the expense, in the report currency

approverAdjustedAmount.description: The total amount adjusted for the expense by the approver

attendeeCount.description: The total number of attendees associated with the expense

authorizationRequestExpenseId.description: The authorization request expense id associated with the expense

budgetAccrualDate.description: The budget accrual date (ISO-8601) of the expense (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601). Format: YYYY-MM-DD

businessPurpose.description: The text input for the business purpose by the user

claimedAmount.description: The total non-personal amount claimed for reimbursement for the expense

customData.description: This is a set of data that the custom fields contain for the expense based on the configuration. This set might be empty if no custom fields are configured

ereceiptImageId.description: The unique identifier of the eReceipt image associated with the expense

exchangeRate.description: Exchange rate data for the expense. Please refer to the 'ExchangeRate' object for more information

expenseId.description: The unique identifier for the expense

expenseSourceIdentifiers.description: The list of expense sources associated with the expense

expenseTaxSummary.description: Tax information for the expense. Please refer to the 'ExpenseTaxSummary' object for more information

expenseType.description: The expense type information for the expense. Please refer to the 'ExpenseType' object for more information

hasBlockingExceptions.description: Whether the expense has any exceptions that blocks it from being submitted

hasExceptions.description: Whether the expense has any exceptions

hasMissingReceiptDeclaration.description: Whether the expense has an affidavit declaration for missing receipt

imageCertificationStatus.description: The final status of the receipt image associated with the expense. Possible values: Refer [Receipts Status V4 API](https://github.concur.com/receipts/receipt-service/wiki/GRDC-API-Docs#possible-digitizationstatus-codes)

isAutoCreated.description: Whether the expense is auto created

isExcludedFromCashAdvanceByUser.description: Whether the user has excluded the expense from cash advance

isExpenseRejected.description: Whether the approver or processor has rejected this expense in the report. If this is true then this expense will be sent back to the report submitted in an addendum (split) report

isImageRequired.description: Whether the image is required for the expense

isPaperReceiptReceived.description: Whether the paper receipt was received for the expense

isPaperReceiptRequired.description: Whether the paper receipt is required for the expense to be submitted

isPersonalExpense.description: Whether the expense is marked as personal (that is, non-reimbursable) by the user

jptRouteId.description: The unique route ID to identify a Japan rail route

links.description: Resource links related to this call

location.description: The location information of the expense. Please refer to the 'Location' object for more information

merchantTaxId.description: Merchant tax id for the expense

mileage.description: The mileage data associated with the expense. Please refer to the 'Mileage' object for more information

parentExpenseId.description: Expense Id of the parent expense

paymentType.description: The payment type information for the expense. Please refer to the 'PaymentType' object for more information

postedAmount.description: The amount of the expense, in the report currency

receiptImageId.description: The unique identifier of the image associated with the expense

receiptType.description: Receipt type for the expense. Please refer to the 'ReceiptType' object for more information

taxRateLocation.description: Transaction location relative to the employee's home location as defined by their user profile. Possible values: FOREIGN - The expense transaction took place in foreign currency, HOME - The expense transaction took place in the reimbursement currency, OUT_OF_PROVINCE - The expense transaction took place outside the state jurisdiction. Default value: HOME

transactionAmount.description: The amount of the expense, in the transaction currency paid to the vendor

transactionDate.description: The transaction date (ISO-8601) of the expense (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601). Format: YYYY-MM-DD

travel.description: The travel data associated with the expense. Please refer to the 'Travel' object for more information

travelAllowance.description: The travel allowance data associated with the expense. Please refer to the 'TravelAllowance' object for more information

vendor.description: The vendor information for the expense. Please refer to the 'Vendor' object for more information

currencyCode.description: The 3-letter ISO 4217 currency code for the expense report currency, based on the user's assigned reimbursement currency when the report was created. Examples: USD - US dollars; BRL - Brazilian real; CAD - Canadian dollar; CHF - Swiss franc; EUR - Euro; GBO - Pound sterling; HKD - Hong Kong dollar; INR - Indian rupee; MXN - Mexican peso; NOK - Norwegian krone; SEK - Swedish krona

value.description: The amount in the defined currency

calculatedDailyRate.description: The calculated car rental daily rate

carClass.description: The car class. Maximum length: 4 characters. Examples: 'IDAD', 'ECMZ', 'PCAV', 'IGDV'

currencyCode.description: The 3-letter ISO 4217 currency code. Examples: USD - US dollars, BRL - Brazilian real, CAD - Canadian dollar

endDate.description: The car rental end date(ISO-8601)(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601). Format: YYYY-MM-DD

fuelServiceCharge.description: The fuel service charge. Minimum value: 0

numberOfRentalDays.description: The number of car rental calculated days. Minimum value: 0

startDate.description: The car rental start date (ISO-8601) (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601). Format: YYYY-MM-DD .

unitsDriven.description: The total units driven. Minimum value: 0

vendorName.description: The name of the car vendor. Maximum length: 255 characters. Example: 'ABC Rent A Car'

httpStatus.description: The http response code and phrase for the response

path.description: The URI of the attempted request

timestamp.description: The time when the error was captured

endDate.description: The hotel checkout date (ISO-8601) (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601). Format: YYYY-MM-DD .

numberOfNights.description: The number of nights. Minimum value: 1

startDate.description: The hotel checkin date (ISO-8601) (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601). Format: YYYY-MM-DD .

airlineName.description: The name of the airline vendor. Maximum length: 255 characters. Example: 'Alaska Airlines'

endDate.description: The last travel date or the travel end date(ISO-8601) (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601). Format: YYYY-MM-DD .

numberOfTravelDays.description: The number of days of travel. Minimum value: 1

startDate.description: The first travel date or the travel start date (ISO-8601) (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601). Format: YYYY-MM-DD .

amountNotApproved.description: The amount that was not approved for the report

analyticsGroupId.description: The unique identifier of the business intelligence hierarchy node

approvalStatus.description: The report’s approval status, in the user’s language

approvedAmount.description: The total amount of approved expenses in the report

claimedAmount.description: The total amount of all non-personal expenses in the report

overLimitAccountCode.description: The ledger account code associated with the allocation if it exceeds a pre-defined threshold, for example, the user’s travel allowance limit

percentage.description: The percentage of the total expense that this allocation represents

expenseIds.description: This is an array of unique identifiers of expenses within this report that are being updated

id.description: The unique identifier of the Payment type. Maximum length: 4 characters. Example: 'CASH'

dailyLimitAmount.description: The allowed amount based on government travel allowance rates

expenseAttendeeList.description: The list of attendees associated with the expense. Maximum attendees: 500

noShowAttendeeCount.description: The number of attendees that were planned but did not show up. Default value: 0

customData.description: This is a set of data that the custom fields contain for the resource based on the configuration. This set might be empty if no custom fields are configured

associatedAttendeeCount.description: The count of total attendees. A count greater than 1 means there are unnamed attendees associated with this expense-attendee record. Default value: 1

attendeeId.description: The unique identifier of the associated expense attendee within Concur

customData.description: The set of data the custom fields contain for the attendee based on the configuration. This set might be empty if no custom fields are configured

isTraveling.description: Whether the attendee was traveling when the expense was incurred, used for FBT tax calculations

transactionAmount.description: The portion of the expense transaction amount assigned to this attendee for both individual expense tracking and attendee totals across time periods

versionNumber.description: The version number of the attendee. This field value may always be 1, depending on the configuration. Default value: 1

endLocation.description: Location where the travel ended. Maximum length: 100 characters
